content:
I'm glad you mentioned that! It sounds like you're taking great care of Max's health by staying on top of his flea and tick prevention. Chewy.com is a great resource for pet owners, and it's wonderful that you were able to get a 3-month supply of medication for around $40.

Flea and tick prevention is so important, especially during peak seasons when those pesky critters are more active. By using a reliable medication, you're not only protecting Max from the discomfort and health risks associated with flea and tick infestations, but you're also reducing the risk of diseases they can transmit.

Remember to apply the medication as directed and to keep an eye out for any signs of flea or tick activity, even with the medication in place. It's always better to be proactive when it comes to your pet's health, and it sounds like you're doing a great job!

If you have any questions or concerns about flea and tick prevention or Max's health in general, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help!
